title: What symbol is used to indicate which paragraph word art is attached to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not really current on many very new usages often seen on the internet but I am an editor/writer. I assume you mean how to refer to a piece of art (photo, drawing, figure, table, etc.) discussed within a text. Anytime I want to illustrate my sentence with art I use, for example, (Table 1). Or write ‘as seen in Table 1.’ I hope this helps and that I’m not too far afield from your intent.
